General.Name: Xingtong Shipping Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Xingtong Shipping Co., Ltd. operates as a chemical tanker shipping company. The company transports liquid chemicals, refined oils, and petroleum gas. As of December 31, 2022, the company operates 21 ships of various types of bulk liquid goods. Xingtong Shipping Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Quanzhou, China.
